title: Inhibitor turret sound (New Summoner's Rift)
body: Could we consider lowering the sound of the lasers or outright removing them unless they target champs? It muddles out more crucial game sounds in my opinion and is somewhat inconsistent with otherwise silent towers of the map.

replies.body:
Hey there!

So, some of the sounds on the new Rift are still work in progress. The laser turret sounds specifically are being improved on as I write this - never fear, they'll be cool when we're done with 'em!  =)
All the turrets laser sound like heart beats to me. It make me feel uneasy.

> All the turrets laser sound like heart beats to me. It make me feel uneasy.

Ikr!! They sound somehow soft... But their damage......
